title: "This Is Crazy: Tesla Recalls 100K+ Cars, Stock Goes Up!"
excerpt: "Tesla will recall about 135k Model S and Model Y luxury vehicles due to some touch-screen related issues, making it one of the electric vehicle bellwether’s largest recalls to date. However, despite the news Tesla stock actually jumped by about 4% in Tuesday’s trading."
